_description: The uncertainty of worldly honour — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
Worldly worship is Ioye transitoryVnsure assuraunce highnes
                    declinable…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…In whiche who hym most surely assurithIn most vnsuerte
                    perilously endurith
BLAdd34360.Attributed Author:
verbum Magestri I lidgate / quasi honor mundi (f. 77,
                    margin)
BLAdd34360.Attributed Title:
verbum Magestri I lidgate / quasi honor mundi (f. 77,
                    margin)
BLAdd34360.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 192 (1934); repr. 1961: 709.

Worldly worship is Ioye transitoryeVnsure assuraunce highnes
                    declynable…

…In whiche who hym surely assurithIn most vnsuerte
                    most perilously endurith
